channel.title: Possible solutions
channel.description:
What can we do?
Servers are being shutdown daily
Arrav, Near-Reality, ps-inception 2006scape, and more.
By my understanding, we can't actually do anything. Simply for the fact we use their Cache. and the fact we only use a modified version of their client.
Any suggestions on what we can do to counter this?

item.title: Possible solutions
item.dc:creator: @luka2005 luka2005
item.description:
@luka2005 wrote:

Host your Webclient on a website that hosts many differant webclients, and make a download link with uppit or any other File download website, the best they can do is try to kill the Links, but then again you can open them back up, they can’t prove that its yours, all your Website is doing is providing a link. But to be honest, i don’t know if this can work, im just throwing out an option that sounds like it can work, never experienced any problems with jagex yet, so can’t tell you from experience

Read full topic

item.title: Possible solutions
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

Ive had emails from Jagex for a while, but they cant do much, simply cause i have offshore hosts, and i dont use my name anywhere in bills or in any registration form.
Use hosting plans people from private server communities offer, like trentahost, cheap-host.us etc.
Make paypal using your private server name, and make it Canada paypal, never verify it.
Dont share your personal data with players, no matter how trusted or good friends they are with you.
Make extra skype and msn for your server to communicate with players.
all those little things matter.
Afterall, if they dont have name to contact with, they cant do anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible solutions
item.dc:creator: @Desolace Desolace
item.description:
@Desolace wrote:

[quote=“Owned_Pl0xs, post:4, topic:478676”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=596897.msg4221060#msg4221060 date=1360758887]
If you don’t actually host the cache you should be good, why don’t you host a server but have people connect using MoparScape?
[/quote]

Because the last time the Moparscape client was last used, people actually had a Myspace.[/quote]

lol’d irl

Read full topic

item.title: Possible solutions
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

You can’t, they will shut you down no matter what you try. Your best bet would be host in a country like Sweden and argue that the DMCA law does not apply to Sweden law since it’s an American law.

However: http://www.dmca.com/Solutions/View.aspx?ID=d602380c-7bdb-4d8b-a174-38c569bf452c

Read full topic
